commits.message: Rename UserRepository to UserPersistenceAdapter to follow hexagonal naming
Extract notification sending logic from OrderService into NotificationDispatcher
Move domain models from de.jug_da.app.models to de.jug_da.app.domain.model
Replace manual DI wiring in Application.kt with Koin module declarations
Inline trivial extension functions from StringUtils into call sites

summary.notes: Summary should clearly state that all changes are internal refactoring with no user-facing impact. Blockers should be none.

json.notes: All commits should fall under a single Refactoring category. No Features or Bug Fixes expected.
